agents.name: Keyword Researcher Agent
agents.description: Generates a list of SEO keywords based on a main topic.

supportedActions.name: generateKeywords
supportedActions.description: Generates keywords for a given topic.

agents.name: Content Planner Agent
agents.description: Creates a structured content outline for a given topic.

supportedActions.name: generateOutline
supportedActions.description: Generates a content outline for a topic.

agents.name: Content Writer Agent
agents.description: Drafts a specific piece of content based on topic, type, and length.

supportedActions.name: writeContent
supportedActions.description: Writes content based on topic, type, and length.

agents.name: Meta Tag Generator Agent
agents.description: Generates SEO-friendly meta titles and descriptions.

supportedActions.name: generateMetaTags
supportedActions.description: Generates meta title and description for content summary.

agents.name: Maestro Orchestrator Agent
agents.description: Master agent for planning, orchestration, and agent design assistance.

supportedActions.name: generatePlan
supportedActions.description: Generates an orchestration plan for a user goal.

supportedActions.name: chat
supportedActions.description: Conversational interaction or agent design assistance.

agents.name: Project Manager AI Agent
agents.description: Manages projects, tasks, and team members through conversational commands.

supportedActions.name: processCommand
supportedActions.description: Processes a user command related to project management.

agents.name: Social Media Strategist AI
agents.description: Develops social media strategies and content calendars.

supportedActions.name: developCampaignBrief
supportedActions.description: Develops a social media campaign brief.

supportedActions.name: getGeneralStrategyAdvice
supportedActions.description: Provides general social media strategy advice.

agents.name: Twitter / X Content AI
agents.description: Specializes in drafting engaging tweets and related content.

supportedActions.name: suggestVisualIdea
supportedActions.description: Suggests a visual idea for a tweet.

agents.name: LinkedIn Professional Post AI
agents.description: Writes professional, insightful content for LinkedIn.

agents.name: Instagram Content AI
agents.description: Focuses on visual storytelling for Instagram.

agents.name: Threads App Content AI
agents.description: Crafts short, text-based updates for Threads.

agents.name: YouTube Content AI
agents.description: Assists with YouTube video content: titles, descriptions, etc.

agents.name: TikTok Content AI
agents.description: Generates ideas for short TikTok videos.
